review.title: “Just retail, nothing really special about working here”
review.pros: Pros – hours were pretty flexible as long as you gave them a heads up, work was pretty easy to do all in all, nothing was mind numbly difficult. work would get busy but never chaotic
review.cons: Cons – there were language barriers with management & they did not seem interested in the things they were doing, which trickled down to the employees
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – hire better managers
